blackjack.daniel.ibanez

Class PlayerAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackjack.daniel.ibanez.Player
      • blackjack.daniel.ibanez.PlayerAI

  • public class PlayerAI
extends Player
    Represents a computer player in a blackjack game. Different players can implement different strategies.

      • getPlayingStrategy

        public Strat getPlayingStrategy(int dealerCard,
                                Hand playerHand)
        Parameters:
        dealerCard - value of the card that the dealer is showing
        playerHand - Hand object contain the cards that the player is holding
        Returns:
        enumeration representing player's next move: H (hit), S(stand), Dh(double or hit), Ds(double or stand)
